Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: Haitao Pan
Message:
feat: Add security audit skill with best practices

- Created automated security audit script
- Detects hardcoded secrets, API keys, passwords
- Validates token transmission security
- Checks for sensitive data logging
- Comprehensive best practices guide
- Ready for use in all repositories

Features:
- Quick audit script with color-coded output
- Detects AWS keys, Stripe keys, private keys
- Validates environment variable usage
- Checks .gitignore configuration
- Exit codes for CI/CD integration

All tests passing in github-org-cloud-neutral-toolkit
